mapper.select: SELECT A.IDX, B.M_IDX, B.IDX AS D_IDX, B.CONTENT, B.CHECK_YN FROM CHECKLIST A LEFT JOIN CHECKLIST_D B ON B.M_IDX = A.IDX WHERE A.ID = #{id}
SELECT A.IDX, B.M_IDX, B.CONTENT, B.CHECK_YN , A.LIST_NAME FROM CHECKLIST A LEFT JOIN CHECKLIST_D B ON B.M_IDX = A.IDX WHERE A.ID = #{id} AND B.M_IDX = #{idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE CHECKLIST SET LIST_NAME = #{listName}, EDT = NOW() WHERE IDX = #{idx}
INSERT INTO CHECKLIST_D( M_IDX, CONTENT, D_WDT, D_EDT, CHECK_YN) VALUES( #{idx}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW(), "N")
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHECKLIST(ID, LIST_NAME, WDT, EDT) VALUES(#{id}, #{listName}, NOW(), NOW())
INSERT INTO CHECKLIST_D( M_IDX, CONTENT, D_WDT, D_EDT, CHECK_YN) VALUES( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(A.IDX),0) FROM CHECKLIST A WHERE A.ID = #{id}), #{content}, NOW(), NOW(), "N")
mapper.update: UPDATE CHECKLIST_D SET CHECK_YN = #{useYN}, D_EDT = NOW() WHERE IDX = #{dIdx}
